review: Much more than I expected. I thought this was just going to be a streaming device from my laptop to my TV, but it is more than that. First installation was very easy. After I connected Chromecast to my Wi-Fi, I started a Netflix movie from my laptop. My laptop battery was dying, so I turned my laptop off and to my surprise, the Netflix movie kept on playing. I thought the movie was streaming through the laptop to the TV and that I would need to keep it on for the movie to play, but the movie was streaming from my Wi-Fi to the Chromecast device. Very Nice!
